reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress sexy and comfortable, with a perfect fit that's not too tight or uncomfortable.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy dress
items.body: This dress is effortlessly stunning — perfect for date night! The fit is true to size, and the soft, stretchy fabric makes it both comfortable and flattering. The quality is excellent, and it’s available in a variety of beautiful colors. It’s a confident, eye-catching choice for any special occasion. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Revealing and Beautiful
items.body: I am 210lbs, 5ft 9in tall with wide hips and smallish waist. Bust 42 D/Waist 40”/Hips 50” I feel beautiful in this dress! Be aware: The slits come up to the torso. I bought this for an adult themed costume party. It is very revealing and was perfect for that. To wear it for other functions, I recommend solid (non-see through) tights that match your skin tone. It won’t cover a regular bra. Get some sticky ones if you need something underneath. I tried wearing bike shorts underneath, that was not cute. It was perfect length (at my ankles). It’s perfectly stretchy. Great value! Seams are good quality for the price. Perfectly sturdy. The fabric is soft and feels like a regular stretch knit from a store rather than some of the weird stuff I sometimes get from SHEIN. Read more
items.author: A. Brand

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curvy girl approved!
items.body: It is perfect! Fit to texture!!! My boyfriend couldn’t keep his hands off of me all night! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars VERY high thigh slit
items.body: Very cute and comfortable. The thigh slit is very high though, I has to wear bike shorts underneath otherwise it would show EVERYTHING. Material was very soft though, just wish the slit was lower so it would be more wearable. Read more
items.author: Halo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, wrong color
items.body: I have ordered this dress in three colors now. I love it. It's very comfortable and light weight. Great for the summer heat. Very sexy, but if you wear shorts underneath you can dress it up to be publicly appropriate. The reason this got 3 stars instead of 5 is that the picture shows a deep, rich purple color but I received a more lilac colored dress, which isn't really my color. A little bummed about that. The other two versions of this dress I ordered (red and green) were both the correct color. The Red is very sexy and the Green is an amazing Ren Fest base item. I'm 5'8 and about 155lbs. I ordered a medium. Fits great and the skirt goes down to the tops of my feet. Shorter individuals might need to hem. Read more
items.author: Drew

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and Comfortable
items.body: Something THIS sexy, should NOT be this comfortable!!! I'm a C-section Mom, times 3, so I have the weird shaped stomach that I'm very self conscious about, but OMG, I put this on and I felt so sexy! Again, SO COMFY!!! So, if you are checking comments to see if you should buy it, don't think about it, just do it! You WONT regret it!!! Read more
items.author: Rachel Ferguson Thomas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: So I normally don't post pictures, but the reviews were so up and down for people above 300lbs I felt i needed to. I was skeptical, and ya this is the best photo, but this dress is beautiful, and bold. It's comfortable, fits well, it's light weight great for anything really. The material quality is feel is great it's not to thick or thin. It feels well made. It flows very nicely. For you ladies above 300lbs, please note I'm atleast 400lbs and this dress fit well and still has some give as well. Don't be afraid to buy it. Also I'm 5'6.5" I don't need to have it hemmed but they may very for you Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fav black dress
items.body: Always get compliments when I wear this! Absolutely love it! Very stretchy & comfortable. Definitely drags on the ground without heels. The splits are more noticeable when you are walking otherwise it's not super prominent unless you use something to pinch in the center. Read more
items.author: NR

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split Maxi V Neck Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress High Split Maxi V Neck Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1#darkgreen, 1#brown, 1#black, Red, 1#orange, 1#blue, 1#wine Red, 1#navy, 1#purple, 1#pink, 1#green, 1#lavender, 1#lake, 1#white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
